summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; rezoning the Seattle Center from the Title 24 designations General Commercial (CG) and Manufacturing (M) to the Title 23 designation Neighborhood Commercial (NC); amending Sections 23.47.004, 23.47.010, and 23.47.011 of the Seattle Municipal Code to allow certain exceptions to the Neighborhood Commercial code; and rezoning an offshore area (Seattle Tidelands and Seattle Tidelands Extension No. 1, Kroll page 48E of the Official Land Use Map) that was inadvertently omitted from Ordinance 117245.
